Control.Name: Button
Control.Tooltip: Adds you to your current group: This does nothing but update everything, if you are already in a group. When not in a group, you will be displayed as the only groupmember.

Control.Name: QuestionMark_PosMode
Control.Tooltip: Changes the way the position below is interpreted. Only shown Bars have a position.

Control.Name: QuestionMark_Relative
Control.Tooltip: These values are only used when the Mode is 'Stacking' or 'Offset'. The lowest position is the top-most. A bar in 'Offset'-Mode grows to the bottom.

Control.Name: QuestionMark_Fixed
Control.Tooltip: These values are only used when the Mode is 'Fixed'.

Control.Name: QuestionMark_Barcolor
Control.Tooltip: These colors are displayed on the filled/missing part of the Bar. A half filled bar would be colored 50:50. The 'Filled Barcolor' always defines the left part of the Bar.

Control.Name: QuestionMark_Bartexture
Control.Tooltip: These textures are used for the filled/missing part of the Bar. The 'Filled Bartexture' is always used for the left part of the Bar.

Control.Name: QuestionMark_Text
Control.Tooltip: These Options define which text should be applied to the bar. Be sure to never use one text-source for two bars.

Control.Name: QuestionMark_Offset
Control.Tooltip: These values set the Position of the Icon.

Control.Name: All_ToGroup
Control.Tooltip: Move all from ungrouped to the selected group.

Control.Name: All_FromGroup
Control.Tooltip: Remove all from the selected group.
